trans-unit.source: Vacation Administration

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Administration

trans-unit.source: cc|project includes vacation administration functionality that has been designed to fit in with the job structures. This enables vacation administration to be performed together with job planning.

seg-source.mrk: cc|project includes vacation administration functionality that has been designed to fit in with the job structures.
This enables vacation administration to be performed together with job planning.

trans-unit.source: The individual vacation requests are entered by line. Once the date details have been entered, the scheduled time is calculated automatically and set up in the calendar as scheduled time.

seg-source.mrk: The individual vacation requests are entered by line.
Once the date details have been entered, the scheduled time is calculated automatically and set up in the calendar as scheduled time.

trans-unit.source: Setup

seg-source.mrk: Setup

trans-unit.source: It is not necessary to create job lines to use the functionality of the vacation module. This is only needed if all processing should be done with cc|project as a common platform.

seg-source.mrk: It is not necessary to create job lines to use the functionality of the vacation module.
This is only needed if all processing should be done with cc|project as a common platform.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation Administration job in the Job Budget Calculation view

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation Administration job in the Job Budget Calculation view

trans-unit.source: There is no binding structure for the lines; it is only important that a link is created to a cc|project WBS Position.

seg-source.mrk: There is no binding structure for the lines; it is only important that a link is created to a cc|project WBS Position.

trans-unit.source: Resource Card

seg-source.mrk: Resource Card

trans-unit.source: Settings for vacation administration are defined for a person on the Resource Card.

seg-source.mrk: Settings for vacation administration are defined for a person on the Resource Card.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation Administration settings on the Resource Card

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation Administration settings on the Resource Card

trans-unit.source: The fields on the Vacation FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the Vacation FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Vacation Entitlement Days/Year

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Entitlement Days/Year

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of vacation days per year for which the employee is entitled.

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of vacation days per year for which the employee is entitled.

trans-unit.source: Vacation Entitlement Available

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Entitlement Available

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of vacation days available for the employee, populated by posting the Entitlement values in the Vacation Entry process (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref383164949" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Vacation Entitlement Posting” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of vacation days available for the employee, populated by posting the Entitlement values in the Vacation Entry process (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref383164949" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Vacation Entitlement Posting” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Application for Leave

seg-source.mrk: Application for Leave

trans-unit.source: Indicates the number of vacation days pending in the Application for Leave process (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref383164993" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Application for Leave” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the number of vacation days pending in the Application for Leave process (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref383164993" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Application for Leave” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Vacation Job No.

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Job No.

trans-unit.source: Provides the link to a vacation job in cc|project; used when Application for Leave is posted and job journal entries are created.

seg-source.mrk: Provides the link to a vacation job in cc|project; used when Application for Leave is posted and job journal entries are created.

trans-unit.source: Vacation WBS

seg-source.mrk: Vacation WBS

trans-unit.source: Indicates the link to the specific WBS position of the vacation job in cc|project; used when Application for Leave is posted and job journal entries are created

seg-source.mrk: Indicates the link to the specific WBS position of the vacation job in cc|project; used when Application for Leave is posted and job journal entries are created

trans-unit.source: Vacation Processing

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Processing

trans-unit.source: All vacation postings will be posted and recorded through an individual vacation journal. Two types of postings can be undertaken:

seg-source.mrk: All vacation postings will be posted and recorded through an individual vacation journal.
Two types of postings can be undertaken:

trans-unit.source: Vacation Entitlement Posting –Typically used for annual vacation entitlement but can be used for special types of leave.

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Entitlement Posting –Typically used for annual vacation entitlement but can be used for special types of leave.

trans-unit.source: Application for Leave – Each application for leave will be registered through the journal.

seg-source.mrk: Application for Leave – Each application for leave will be registered through the journal.

trans-unit.source: All leave-related postings can be registered through the menu processing in the journal. The vacation entries per person are then transferred to the Resource Card for each person.

seg-source.mrk: All leave-related postings can be registered through the menu processing in the journal.
The vacation entries per person are then transferred to the Resource Card for each person.

trans-unit.source: Vacation Entitlement Posting

seg-source.mrk: Vacation Entitlement Posting

trans-unit.source: The initial entry of vacation entitlement for each person is registered and posted in the Vacation Entry page, accessed from the cc|project menu by clicking Processing > Vacation Entry.

seg-source.mrk: The initial entry of vacation entitlement for each person is registered and posted in the Vacation Entry page, accessed from the cc|project menu by clicking Processing > Vacation Entry.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This process should be done annually to register vacation entitlements.

seg-source.mrk: This process should be done annually to register vacation entitlements.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation Entry page with new line added but no entries

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation Entry page with new line added but no entries

trans-unit.source: Entitlement can be entered manually or through the “Next Entitlement for All” function, which automatically suggests the vacation entitlement for all resources with Type = Person. To use the “Next Entitlement for All” function, enter a line to be used as a template for the other resources. The following data will then be transferred to all other persons:

seg-source.mrk: Entitlement can be entered manually or through the “Next Entitlement for All” function, which automatically suggests the vacation entitlement for all resources with Type = Person.
To use the “Next Entitlement for All” function, enter a line to be used as a template for the other resources.
The following data will then be transferred to all other persons:

trans-unit.source: Document No.

seg-source.mrk: Document No.

trans-unit.source: Posting date

seg-source.mrk: Posting date

trans-unit.source: Start

seg-source.mrk: Start

trans-unit.source: Finish

seg-source.mrk: Finish

trans-unit.source: : Preparing to select the “Next Entitlement for All” function after template line entry

seg-source.mrk: : Preparing to select the “Next Entitlement for All” function after template line entry

trans-unit.source: Once the template is entered, click Actions > Next Entitlement for All on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Once the template is entered, click Actions > Next Entitlement for All on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: : Remaining resources added with the vacation entitlement as indicated on their Resource Cards

seg-source.mrk: : Remaining resources added with the vacation entitlement as indicated on their Resource Cards

trans-unit.source: The Document No. is used as the basis for the administration of leave applications. Vacation entries can only be created if there is enough entitlement remaining for the document number.

seg-source.mrk: The Document No.
is used as the basis for the administration of leave applications.
Vacation entries can only be created if there is enough entitlement remaining for the document number.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: No link has been set to the VACATION job because it is only used with the “Application for Leave” function (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref383164993" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Application for Leave” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: No link has been set to the VACATION job because it is only used with the “Application for Leave” function (refer to topic <MadCap:xref href="#_Ref383164993" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">“Application for Leave” on page 1</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Once all lines have been created and are ready for posting, click Post on the ribbon.

seg-source.mrk: Once all lines have been created and are ready for posting, click Post on the ribbon.

trans-unit.source: The current entitlement can be reviewed on the Resource Card for each person.

seg-source.mrk: The current entitlement can be reviewed on the Resource Card for each person.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation entitlement assigned to resource P016

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation entitlement assigned to resource P016

trans-unit.source: Application for Leave

seg-source.mrk: Application for Leave

trans-unit.source: Applications for leave can be performed:

seg-source.mrk: Applications for leave can be performed:

trans-unit.source: per person from the Resource Card or in the Vacation Entry page

seg-source.mrk: per person from the Resource Card or in the Vacation Entry page

trans-unit.source: in a batch for multiple persons/days in the Vacation Entry page

seg-source.mrk: in a batch for multiple persons/days in the Vacation Entry page

trans-unit.source: From the Resource Card, click Navigate > Application for Leave. The Vacation Entry page opens with the Person No. and Entry Type fields auto-populated with the and Application for leave, respectively.

seg-source.mrk: From the Resource Card, click Navigate > Application for Leave.
The Vacation Entry page opens with the Person No.
and Entry Type fields auto-populated with the and Application for leave, respectively.

trans-unit.source: The document number of the last open vacation entitlement is displayed in the Document No. field and the Description field indicates the description of the last open vacation entitlement and the remaining number of days.

seg-source.mrk: The document number of the last open vacation entitlement is displayed in the Document No.
field and the Description field indicates the description of the last open vacation entitlement and the remaining number of days.

trans-unit.source: The Start and Finish dates need to be entered, which will be the base for the calculation of Vacation Days of the relevant calendar for this person.

seg-source.mrk: The Start and Finish dates need to be entered, which will be the base for the calculation of Vacation Days of the relevant calendar for this person.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation Entry with granted application for leave for resource P016

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation Entry with granted application for leave for resource P016

trans-unit.source: Vacation days can only be posted if they are scheduled and granted. To schedule the days, click Actions > Schedule Vacation.

seg-source.mrk: Vacation days can only be posted if they are scheduled and granted.
To schedule the days, click Actions > Schedule Vacation.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation Entry with scheduled leave for resource P016

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation Entry with scheduled leave for resource P016

trans-unit.source: The scheduler will generate calendar entries, which can be manually amended (i.e. for half days). In any case, the number of days entered must match the number of days scheduled.

seg-source.mrk: The scheduler will generate calendar entries, which can be manually amended (i.e.
for half days).
In any case, the number of days entered must match the number of days scheduled.

trans-unit.source: Prior to posting, the Granted check box must be manually selected on the line if unselected.

seg-source.mrk: Prior to posting, the Granted check box must be manually selected on the line if unselected.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation Entry with granted leave for resource P016

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation Entry with granted leave for resource P016

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: This entire process can also be done for multiple users and days directly in the Vacation Entry page, when opened from the cc|project > Processing menu.

seg-source.mrk: This entire process can also be done for multiple users and days directly in the Vacation Entry page, when opened from the cc|project > Processing menu.

trans-unit.source: By posting the vacation days, the available entitlement is deducted and indicated on the Resource Card.

seg-source.mrk: By posting the vacation days, the available entitlement is deducted and indicated on the Resource Card.

trans-unit.source: : Resource Card with entitlement and remaining leave for resource P016

seg-source.mrk: : Resource Card with entitlement and remaining leave for resource P016

trans-unit.source: Posted entries are accessible by clicking the value in the Vacation Entitlement Available field on the Resource Card.

seg-source.mrk: Posted entries are accessible by clicking the value in the Vacation Entitlement Available field on the Resource Card.

trans-unit.source: : Posted vacation entries for resource P016

seg-source.mrk: : Posted vacation entries for resource P016

trans-unit.source: Additionally, the vacation days are transferred to the resource’s Time Entry job journal. The Job No. and WBS assigned to the Resource Card are automatically populated.

seg-source.mrk: Additionally, the vacation days are transferred to the resource’s Time Entry job journal.
The Job No.
and WBS assigned to the Resource Card are automatically populated.

trans-unit.source: : Vacation entries transferred to the Job Time Entry page

seg-source.mrk: : Vacation entries transferred to the Job Time Entry page
